title: How to See Buy Orders on Steam

steps.title: Go to https://steamcommunity.com/market a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://steamcommunity.com/market a web browser. You can use any web browser you want to to view your buy orders on Steam. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Log in.
steps.content: Log in. You need to be logged into your Steam account to see your active buy orders. If you are already logged in, you can skip this step.

steps.title: Find your orders under "My buy orders."
steps.content: Find your orders under "My buy orders." If you have any open orders, they will appear in this section of the Community Market front page.

steps.title: Click a buy order to see its details.
steps.content: Click a buy order to see its details. This displays information about the buy order. If you want to cancel an open buy order, click Cancel . If a buy order was canceled for seemingly no reason, it's likely because of changes in your Steam account, problems with your wallet balance, or because something about the item has changed.
